answers.answer: try monistat it helped when i had this same little annoying problem
Buy Monistat 7 at your local drugstore.  This should work for the infection.  Vagisil won't cure a yeast infection.  It will only help give temporary relief from itching.

If you self treat, any test that the doc does next week will be worthless. You could make matters worse if it isn't even a yeast infection. Try icing the area with a bag of frozen peas or a cold beer bottle.  You could also try a sitz bath.
Try the monistat its gonna itch like hell but it always works for me! Good Luck

Hi, vagisil only stops the itching, has nothing in it to cure the infection.  Use monistat 7 for 7 days and it should go away.  IF you get a lot of yeast infections, you should see you dr to rule out any underlying conditions, like diabetes and so on.  Good Luck!Becky, CNA
I'm having my first yeast infection and I'm not doing any treatment how long will it last??

question: i have not been able to make a doctors appoinment yet , so i am dealing with a yeast infection and its been about four days, i am using vagasile but it does not seem to have any affect on it has anyone tried something ggod that i might use until i can get to town to make a doctors  apointment. thank you
